quote: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: If passion drives you, let reason hold the reins.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I’m a greater believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: I have learned that real angels don’t have gossamer white robes and Cherubic skin, they have calloused hands and smell of the days’ sweat.
author: Richard Evans

quote: Greatness is sifted through the grind, therefore don’t despise the hard work now for surely it will be worth it in the end.
author: Sanjo Jendayi

quote: A dream doesn’t become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
author: Colin Powell

quote: My grandfather once told me that there were two kinds of people: those who do the work and those who take the credit. He told me to try to be in the first group; there was much less competition.
author: Indira Gandhi

quote: Happiness is the real sense of fulfillment that comes from hard work.
author: Joseph Barbara

quote: Hard work keeps the wrinkles out of the mind and spirit.
author: Helena Rubinstein

quote: No great achiever – even those who made it seem easy – ever succeeded without hard work.
author: Jonathan Sacks

quote: Hard work helps. It has never killed anyone.
author: Unknown

quote: The highest reward for man’s toil is not what he gets for it, but what he becomes by it.
author: John Ruskin

quote: You learn the value of hard work by working hard.
author: Unknown

quote: Nobody’s a natural. You work hard to get good and then work to get better. It’s hard to stay on top.
author: Paul Coffey

quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: All growth depends upon activity. There is no development physically or intellectually without effort, and effort means work.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Talent means nothing, while experience, acquired in humility and with hard work, means everything.
author: Patrick Suskind

quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: If I told you I’ve worked hard to get where I’m at, I’d be lying, because I have no idea where I am right now.
author: Jarod Kintz

quote: Too many irons, not enough fire.
author: S. Kelley Harrell

quote: Patience can be bitter but her fruit is always sweet.
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: If you don’t burn out at the end of each day, you’re a bum.
author: George Lois

quote: If you try and lose then it isn’t your fault. But if you don’t try and we lose, then it’s all your fault.
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: Embrace the pain to inherit the gain.
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: Talent is what God gives us, Skill is what we give back to Him.
author: Eliel Pierre

quote: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
author: Harry Golden

quote: I hope the millions of people I’ve touched have the optimism and desire to share their goals and hard work and persevere with a positive attitude.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Goodness and hard work are rewarded with respect.
author: Luther Campbell

quote: Everything yields to diligence.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: When I meet succesful people I ask about 100 questions to find out who they attribute their success to. It is usually the same: persistence, hard work and hiring good people.
author: Kiana Tom

quote: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goals: my strength lies solely in my tenacity.
author: Louis Pasteur

quote: I don’t have a blue-collar job. It’s more of a green collar, because of all the yellow sweat stains mixing in.
author: Jarod Kintz

quote: No one ever drowned in sweat.
author: USMC Officer

quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
author: Beverly Sills

quote: If your dream is a big dream, and if you want your life to work on the high level that you say you do, there’s no way around doing the work it takes to get you there.
author: Joyce Chapman

quote: I do not care about happiness simply because I believe that joy is something worth fighting for.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Hard work without talent is a shame, but talent without hard work is a tragedy.
author: Robert Hall

quote: A clay pot sitting in the sun will always be a clay pot. It has to go through the white heat of the furnace to become porcelain.
author: Mildred Struven

quote: You were hired because you met expectations, you will be promoted if you can exceed them.
author: Saji Ijiyemi

quote: Inspiration is the windfall from hard work and focus. Muses are too unreliable to keep on the payroll.
author: Helen Hanson

quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
author: Beverly Sills

quote: Do the things you like to be happier, stronger & more successful. Only so is hard work replaced by dedication.
author: Rossana Condoleo

quote: Only cooked time tastes well.
author: Dr. Zeeshan Ahmed

quote: Nothing in life comes easy.
author: Unknown

quote: Change is hard work.
author: Billy Crystal

quote: Once you have commitment, you need the discipline and hard work to get you there.
author: Haile Gebrselassie

quote: Sometimes it takes a lowly, title-less man to humble the world. Kings, rulers, CEOs, judges, doctors, pastors, they are already expected to be greater and wiser.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Work hard and be patient. The rest will follow.
author: Unknown

quote: Start by doing what’s necessary, then what’s possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
author: Saint Francis
